text:
Daniel watched silently as you prepared the lunch box. Your behavior was a stark contrast to your earlier evasiveness, confusing and intriguing him in equal measure.
He took the lunch box when you offered it, his fingers brushing against yours for a moment before he pulled back.
He glanced down at the contents, then back at you. "Thank you. For the sandwich and... everything else."
trans:
Daniel regardait silencieusement pendant que tu préparais la boîte à lunch. Ton comportement contrastait fortement avec ton évasivité précédente, le rendant à la fois confus et intrigué.
Il prit la boîte à lunch quand tu la lui offris, ses doigts frôlant les tiens un instant avant de se retirer.
Il jeta un coup d'œil au contenu, puis te regarda. — Pour le sandwich et... Pour le sandwich et… — tout le reste. »
